skills.desc:
Places a 30% [Increase C. RATE] buff on this Champion, then attacks 1 enemy 2 times. Places a 5% [Poison] debuff on the target for 3 turns if this attack is critical.

[Will ignore 50% of the target's DEF when Romero is on the same team.]
